name: Edna Natividade da Silva Barros
content: Edna Barros Edna Barros Dr. rer. nat in Computer Science, Tuebingen University, 1993 (Advisor: Prof. Wolfgang Rosentiel). Current Positions Associate professor at the Computer Science Department of the Federal University of Pernambuco Leader of Computer Engineering Research Group (GRECO) Projects Platform Designer Brazil-IP network Iniative Courses Computer Architecture and Organization (in Portuguese) Design Automation of Embedded Systems (in Portuguese) Brief CV English Portuguese Address Universidade Federal de Pernambuco Centro de Inform√°tica Caixa Postal 7851 CEP 50740-540 Recife - PE - Brazil Telephone +55 81 2126 8430 (ext. 4315) +55 81 2126 8438 (fax) Other links of interest ArchC You can reach me by e-mail at: ensb@di.ufpe.br You are currently visitor number since Fev 1998.
